best_practice_option: Mechanisms exist to request additions, changes, and exceptions
remediation_description: Implement a process for users to request changes or exceptions to configurations
remediation_solution: Create a self-service portal where users can submit requests for changes or exceptions. Have an approval workflow before changes are implemented. Log all requests and approvals.
remediation_general_considerations: Ensure proper access controls on the portal. Requests should link to tickets or other tracking mechanisms.
effort_estimate: 2 weeks development time plus ongoing operational overhead
